verses.name: Matthew 1:1
verses.text: Liber generationis Jesu Christi filii David, filii Abraham.

verses.name: Matthew 1:2
verses.text: Abraham genuit Isaac. Isaac autem genuit Jacob. Jacob autem genuit Judam, et fratres ejus.

verses.name: Matthew 1:3
verses.text: Judas autem genuit Phares, et Zaram de Thamar. Phares autem genuit Esron. Esron autem genuit Aram.

verses.name: Matthew 1:4
verses.text: Aram autem genuit Aminadab. Aminadab autem genuit Naasson. Naasson autem genuit Salmon.

verses.name: Matthew 1:5
verses.text: Salmon autem genuit Booz de Rahab. Booz autem genuit Obed ex Ruth. Obed autem genuit Jesse. Jesse autem genuit David regem.

verses.name: Matthew 1:6
verses.text: David autem rex genuit Salomonem ex ea quæ fuit Uriæ.

verses.name: Matthew 1:7
verses.text: Salomon autem genuit Roboam. Roboam autem genuit Abiam. Abias autem genuit Asa.

verses.name: Matthew 1:8
verses.text: Asa autem genuit Josophat. Josophat autem genuit Joram. Joram autem genuit Oziam.

verses.name: Matthew 1:9
verses.text: Ozias autem genuit Joatham. Joatham autem genuit Achaz. Achaz autem genuit Ezechiam.

verses.name: Matthew 1:10
verses.text: Ezechias autem genuit Manassen. Manasses autem genuit Amon. Amon autem genuit Josiam.

verses.name: Matthew 1:11
verses.text: Josias autem genuit Jechoniam, et fratres ejus in transmigratione Babylonis.

verses.name: Matthew 1:12
verses.text: Et post transmigrationem Babylonis : Jechonias genuit Salathiel. Salathiel autem genuit Zorobabel.

verses.name: Matthew 1:13
verses.text: Zorobabel autem genuit Abiud. Abiud autem genuit Eliacim. Eliacim autem genuit Azor.

verses.name: Matthew 1:14
verses.text: Azor autem genuit Sadoc. Sadoc autem genuit Achim. Achim autem genuit Eliud.

verses.name: Matthew 1:15
verses.text: Eliud autem genuit Eleazar. Eleazar autem genuit Mathan. Mathan autem genuit Jacob.

verses.name: Matthew 1:16
verses.text: Jacob autem genuit Joseph virum Mariæ, de qua natus est Jesus, qui vocatur Christus.

verses.name: Matthew 1:17
verses.text: Omnes itaque generationes ab Abraham usque ad David, generationes quatuordecim : et a David usque ad transmigrationem Babylonis, generationes quatuordecim : et a transmigratione Babylonis usque ad Christum, generationes quatuordecim.

verses.name: Matthew 1:18
verses.text: Christi autem generatio sic erat : cum esset desponsata mater ejus Maria Joseph, antequam convenirent inventa est in utero habens de Spiritu Sancto.

verses.name: Matthew 1:19
verses.text: Joseph autem vir ejus cum esset justus, et nollet eam traducere, voluit occulte dimittere eam.

verses.name: Matthew 1:20
verses.text: Hæc autem eo cogitante, ecce angelus Domini apparuit in somnis ei, dicens : Joseph, fili David, noli timere accipere Mariam conjugem tuam : quod enim in ea natum est, de Spiritu Sancto est.

verses.name: Matthew 1:21
verses.text: Pariet autem filium : et vocabis nomen ejus Jesum : ipse enim salvum faciet populum suum a peccatis eorum.

verses.name: Matthew 1:22
verses.text: Hoc autem totum factum est, ut adimpleretur quod dictum est a Domino per prophetam dicentem :

verses.name: Matthew 1:23
verses.text: Ecce virgo in utero habebit, et pariet filium : et vocabunt nomen ejus Emmanuel, quod est interpretatum Nobiscum Deus.

verses.name: Matthew 1:24
verses.text: Exsurgens autem Joseph a somno, fecit sicut præcepit ei angelus Domini, et accepit conjugem suam.

verses.name: Matthew 1:25
verses.text: Et non cognoscebat eam donec peperit filium suum primogenitum : et vocavit nomen ejus Jesum.
